about_the_game:
Welcome to Kebab Simulator VR, where the hustle and bustle of virtual streets meet the mouthwatering aroma of delicious döner kebabs, juicy burgers, and crispy fries! Get ready for a fast-paced, short-lived culinary experience brimming with döner charm.

Main Features:

🥙 Delicious Variety: Dive into the fast-paced world of street food vending and serve up a tasty array of goodies, including authentic döner kebabs, hearty burgers, and golden fries. With something for every taste bud, you’ll keep your virtual customers coming back for more!

🔪 Frantic Cooking Action: Jump into the kitchen and test your skills as you race against the clock to whip up orders with lightning-fast reflexes. With a manageable cartoon aesthetic, you can keep your cool even in the midst of culinary chaos.

🎉 Single Player Fun: Embark on your culinary adventure as you face the challenge of satisfying a never-ending stream of hungry customers. It’s a wild ride full of action, perfect for quick entertainment on the go or in between.

🎮 Easy Controls: Whether you’re a seasoned VR veteran or a newbie to virtual reality, our intuitive controls make it easy to dive right into the fun and serve up virtual street food like a pro.

Ready to feel the rush of running your own virtual street food stand? Grab your VR headset and prepare for a fast and tasty adventure in Kebab Simulator VR!

name: Kebab Simulator VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR: HTC Vive Cosmos, HTC Vive, Occulus CV1, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Occulus Rift S and other compatible VR devices
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR: HTC Vive Cosmos, HTC Vive, Occulus CV1, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Occulus Rift S and other compatible VR devices

short_description: Get ready for a whirlwind of culinary chaos in Kebab Simulator VR! The first, best and only VR Kebab Simulator of the world! Serve up German fast food favorites like doner kebabs, burgers, and fries. It's a short-lived, single-player rush of frantic fun that'll leave you hungry for more!
